comment.author: 43610740@N02
comment._content: Judging from tonality, this image looks way older than 1900??? 1870ties or earlier???

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content: mattenitte: As you say - this print was probably made much earlier than 1900. Even if the albumen print process still existed about 1900, it was by then almost completely replaced by other techniques. Thanks for your observation - I'll change the date to c. 1870. Read more about albumen prints here: albumen.conservation-us.org/library/c20/reilly1980.html /Anna B.
